sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2012/L.7), the SBI: - urges developed country parties to mobilize financial support for the NAP process; - reiterates the request to developed country parties to continue to provide LDC parties with finance, technology and capacity building; - looks forward to the analysis and compilation of support needed for the NAP process; and - looks forward to continuing consideration at SBI 37 of guidance on policies and programmes to enable the above.
